Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Molten Core^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I'm trying to fix this relay, but the damned thing just won't relent. I desperately need to reach a friend. Could you perhaps craft a ^orange;Molten Core^reset; in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;? That should solve my predicament.
That did it, thanks!...hmm, that's odd. No signal from the ^green;lab on Delta Freya II^reset;.  Well, here's your core back. I wonder if my friend is okay?
